column3:
Filename of the image that you have saved to PlutoF
(You do not need to include the suffix of the filename)
column4:
Plate number. T=Top, B=bottom, number  = plate number counting from the baseplate upwards.
NA if the image is not of a plate
column5:
plate = image of a plate
field = image of anything else, no matter where it was taken
column6: To add more information to the previous column
